name: EXTENDED CARE UNIT ROOM 19B
description:
A MEDICAL ADVENTURE

PLAY AS A PERSON EXPERIENCING A MYSTERIOUS HEAT BASED ILLNESS

SURVIVE NIGHT TO NIGHT AGAINST THE HEAT 

FEATURES:

-A MYSTERY WITH 3 ENDINGS

-CLASSIC C.Y.O.A. GAMEPLAY WITH A TWIST

-MEDICAL BASED HORROR 

-AND ???

A game by Milo Stickle-Frizzell

Made for the Solstice Fire and Ice Game Jam (2020)

Additional sound effects used from: 

https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/

https://freesound.org/people/zmb94/

https://freesound.org/people/JoelAudio/

https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/

https://freesound.org/people/laft2k/
